reviewText: I enjoyed the Steve Harvey show, It was witty and fun. When I bought Volume one of the best of the show, I felt cheated. I would have enjoyed a full box set of season one and all I got were five episodes....and none were the pilot of this show. Th shows were Harvey, just not at his best. However five episodes of Steve is better than nothingBennet Pomerantz, AUDIOWORLD
Title: N/A

reviewText: Years after the release of this Volume 1, one has to wonder if Vol 2 (and in my next life the rest of the shows LOL) will ever reach DVD release... It's just a darn shame...
Title: N/A

reviewText: I was rollin off these episodes but I just wish there were more than five of them. RIP to Merlin Santana! I want more of the Steve Harvey Show on DVD!!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is one of the best comedy shows ever.  Steve, Cedric and Wendy were on it.  I only wish the other seasons would hurry up and come out.
summary: The Best of the Steve Harvey Show, Vol. 1
Title: N/A

reviewText: They should have made the whole series instead of the best of. To me that is an insult to all of SH's fans. Please make the whole show availiable instead of just the best of. And yes, please include a tribute to the late Merlin Santana. His life was taken so senselessly and tragic, RIP my brother!
